metadata.feature_description: Upload, manage, and optimize images for posts including thumbnails and featured images

steps.action: Navigate to News page and click Create Post
steps.expected: Post editor opens with image upload interface
steps.actual: Post editor opened with Upload File, Stored Location, and From URL tabs

steps.action: Click Browse to Upload and select PNG image
steps.actual: Image uploaded successfully and displayed with Edit/Delete controls

steps.action: Click Edit to open Change Image dialog
steps.expected: Change Image dialog appears with upload options
steps.actual: Change Image dialog appeared with Upload File, Stored Location, and From URL tabs
JPG image uploaded and replaced the previous PNG image successfully

steps.expected: System rejects non-image file with error message
steps.actual: Error dialog displayed: 'The file is not an image'

steps.action: Upload an image and verify thumbnail display
steps.expected: Thumbnail is automatically generated and displayed
steps.actual: Thumbnail displayed in post editor as preview image (210x180 thumbnails generated server-side per ImageManager.cs)

steps.action: Click Edit button on uploaded image
steps.actual: Change Image dialog appeared with upload options

steps.action: Upload a new image to replace existing
steps.expected: New image replaces the old one
steps.actual: New JPG image successfully replaced the previous PNG image

steps.action: Click Delete button on uploaded image
steps.expected: Image is removed and upload interface returns to empty state
steps.actual: Image deleted successfully, upload area returned to 'Drag and Drop Your Image Here' state
From URL interface appeared with URL input field and Upload button

steps.action: Enter external image URL and click Upload
steps.expected: Image downloads from URL and uploads to post
steps.actual: Network error: 'The remote name could not be resolved' - server cannot access external URLs

issues: Server cannot resolve external URLs (network restriction in test environment). The UploadFromUrl API endpoint exists and is functional per code review, but external network access is blocked.

steps.expected: Gallery of previously stored images appears
steps.actual: Stored Location tab showed grid of available images with search and Recent Uploads options

steps.action: Select an image and click Insert Image
steps.expected: Selected image is inserted into post
steps.actual: cavalier-tv image was successfully inserted with Edit/Delete controls visible

steps.action: Verify drag-and-drop upload area is present
steps.expected: Drag and drop area with visual indicator is displayed
steps.actual: Upload interface shows 'Drag and Drop Your Image Here' with upload icon and 'Browse to Upload' button

observations: Supported image formats confirmed via code: JPG, JPE, BMP, GIF, PNG, JPEG, ICO, SVG (ImageManager.cs line 28)
Thumbnails are automatically generated at 210x180 pixels for regular uploads and 447x240 for featured images
Images are stored in the 'Images/Publisher' folder structure
The file input element has accept attribute limiting to image formats: .jpg,.jpe,.jpeg,.bmp,.gif,.png,.ico,.svg
Upload from URL feature (UploadFromUrl API endpoint) exists in code but could not be tested due to network restrictions in the test environment
